name: COVID19Encounters
title: COVID19 Encounters
description: Given the variability in coding of encounters, this value set will be most useful with robust mapping of source data to the reference terms.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Intended to support surveillance and monitoring of COVID19 health system interactions),(Data Element Scope: Compilation of ICD10 and CPT codes related to encounters for COVID19 infection),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes encounters related to Suspected or Confirmed Infection, Potential Signs and Symptoms, Potential or Known Exposure, and Concern),(Exclusion Criteria: None)

contains.display: Infectious agent detection by nucleic acid (DNA or RNA); severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) (coronavirus disease [COVID-19]), amplified probe technique
Encounter for observation for suspected exposure to other biological agents ruled out
